name: Analyze Root Cause
description: Diagnose root cause of detected anomalies

beats.title: Analysis Requested
acceptanceCriteria: Handler executes successfully and completes
Output is valid and conforms to schema
Event is published to event stream
Telemetry is recorded for monitoring
No errors or warnings are logged
beats.userStory: As a system user, I want the analyzeRequested operation to execute reliably so that system functions operate as expected.
